game

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Ties together the main view component and the model of the game. Contains, in addition to main functionality, AI-methods, save-load and highscore features.
    Author:
    student

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameController

        public GameController()

    • Method Detail

      • tileClick

        public static void tileClick(int id)
        Main click method. Checks for the bombflag and executes the intended action. If it is invoked from any thread other than the main application thread, UI is not updated. The AI runs at another thread, hence the Platform.runLater method to allow for updates.
        Parameters:
        id - an id of the clicked button

      • undoClick

        public static void undoClick()
        Ties undo action and button. If undo indicates the lack of resources by its exception the game info text reflects that.

      • startAI

        public static void startAI(int upperBound,
                           int sleep)
        Initiates the AIs based on the current selection.
        Parameters:
        upperBound - helps with the scoring of random AI
        sleep - sleep parameter of the Thread, lower it down at CPU's risk

      • saveGame

        public static void saveGame()
        Save game functionality. Stops the AI, gets a name from input. Puts all the required data into Save object, encodes it into an .xml file that contains input name, score and move count. Saves .xml file in user main folder, .thirteen/saves directory. Creates the directory if it doesn't exist.

      • loadGame

        public static void loadGame(java.lang.String path,
                            javafx.stage.Stage dialog)
        Restore game functionality. If called from the highscores to load, uses its path. Else lets the user choose using the explorer.
        Parameters:
        path - file path or ""
        dialog - modal window if present

      • showHighscores

        public static void showHighscores(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Initiates a modal window that displays highscores. High scores are 10 save files with the best results. Since highscores are save files, there is a feature to load the high score game. Finds all files in saves directory, gets game information based on the generated save file, puts it in the list. Sorts the lists, initiates the modal window.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - main stage to set the owner of the modal
